name: corporation
description: Fullstack auth example: React+TS client, Express+TS server

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.preview: npm run build && concurrently -k -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run start -w server" "npm run preview -w client"
scripts.dc:url: bash -lc 'PORT=$(docker compose ps -q client | xargs -r docker port | head -n1 | awk -F: '{print $2}'); if [ -n "$PORT" ]; then echo http://localhost:$PORT; else echo client not running; fi'
